title: George Floyd, White Privilege, Black Privilege, Double Standards, and Dick Pics
itunes:title: George Floyd, White Privilege, Black Privilege, Double Standards, and Dick Pics
description:
There’s a lot of opinions flying back and forth right now. And usually, for every opinion, there is a reaction. And at the moment, a lot of us are reacting without thinking it through first. So let’s just take a second to have an actual dialogue (one in which we don’t have to agree) and talk about the issue, not our feelings.
 
On this episode of the Underdog Empowerment podcast, Zach shares a clip from his recent appearance on DoubleB Creates’s podcast where he, Brad and Kevin jammed on the media coverage and popular attitudes surrounding George Floyd’s death, how men and women communicate and relate to each other sexually, and some parting words from Zach on how he plans to teach motivated motherfuckers to fish for a lifetime. Listen in to pull back the curtain on the chaos we’re all reading about right now.
 
Show Notes: https://underdogempowerment.com/george-floyd/
 
Get More Involved: 
 
  1. Leave A Review & Subscribe On iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/podcast/underdog-empowerment/id1373572178
  2. Free A-to-Z roadmap on launching a top-shelf podcast: https://www.podcastpenthouse.com/roadmaps/
  3. Access Our Top Resource Recommendations: https://underdogempowerment.com/resources/
  4. Subscribe On YouTube: https://underdogempowerment.com/youtube
